The ePortal provides a single point of reference to review salary statements and vacation leave information for government employees. \nAs part of its eGovernment policy, the Government of the Commonwealth of Dominica has taken another major initiative in providing online services for its employees. Monthly payslips and vacation balances for government employees are now available online These payslips can be viewed, emailed or printed by the employees. This new facility will allow government employees to access their monthly payslips at a click of a button and will save them the hassle of pursuing Votes Clerks and personal visits to the Treasury Department.
